name: Beach Girls
detailed_description:
After a death in the family you learn that you are due to inherit a beach resort. Upon arrival though things are not as simple, as you must jump through a number of hoops before the park is officially yours for good. And to make matters worse it seems like half the staff appear to be ex's from when you lived here as a child. Can you take the struggling resort and turn it into a real enterprise, mend fences with the girls of your past and make a new life for you at the beach.

Features

  • A huge story with multiple decisions and routes.
  • Over fifty different endings and secrets to uncover.
  • Twelve female romance-able character to get to know.
  • A story that spans a period of twelve months.
  • Manage a resort, make it a success, or become destitute.
